summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5975 for the improvement of West Ray Street from 12th Avenue West to 13th Avenue West; and certain other avenues and alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 79981, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
